name: Of Slimes and Sandwiches
storyline: Our protagonist Lavi wakes up one day wanting to help out his mom with her restaurant. However, with a pet slime and a deer boy by his side, he ends up uncovering the truth behind the 'Slime Sandwiches' that have shaken up the culinary world...
summary:
Of Slime and Sandwiches was a collaborative project made over several discord calls with friends.

The plot, characters, artwork and other aspects were all decided on the spot during those calls, and the result was this: a masterpiece for the ages.
